channel.title: Admin help
channel.description: i want to know how to make people admins and mods i heard it has to do something with compiler but not shure. can you plz put step by step how to make people admins/mods. tyvm

item.title: Admin help
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

heh. Has nothing to do with compiler. Ok, go into character folder, click the character u wanna promote, and your going to find somethin like

character-rights = 0

change the zero to
1 for mod
2 for admin
3 for creator
then save. u mite have to compiler, but idts. Now if ur using testscape, you have to do somethin else, which includes goin into client.java
so open client.java and search for this

 //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

and ull see somethin like this below

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("personsnamehere")) { playerRights = 3; }

Ok, so to make som1 admin, take the “personnamehere” and put in the characters name, and for the playerRights = #;, its same as above, 1 for mod, 2 for admin, and 3 for creator. So if my characters name is mitch…

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mitch")) { playerRights = 3; }
remember to keep parentheses around the characters name

Read full topic
